page.title: 01An Overall View Of Our Block
page.content: Our block is set in the varied farming countryside of Hertfordshire. The large village of Knebworth has been growing steadily during this century due to its proximity to the railway and the A1(M) motorway. The northern border includes the southern tip of the New Town of Stevenage. The smaller villages of Datchworth and Woolmer Green form the southern boundary, while Bragbury End, Astonbury and Hooks Cross form the eastern edge. Just outside the western border of our block lies the original village of Old Knebworth which was centred around Knebworth House and the Parish Church. The majority of the land between is arable farmland.
